---
title: "Wedding Photo Search"
description: "Find yourself in every moment"
page-layout: full
format:
  html:
    include-in-header:
      - text: |
          <link rel="stylesheet" href="photo-search/style.css">
    include-after-body:
      - text: |
          <script src="photo-search/app.js"></script>
comments: false
---

```{=html}
<div class="container">
    <main>
        <!-- Upload Section -->
        <section class="upload-section">
            <div class="upload-zone" id="uploadZone">
                <svg class="upload-icon" width="64" height="64" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
                    <path d="M21 15v4a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2v-4"></path>
                    <polyline points="17 8 12 3 7 8"></polyline>
                    <line x1="12" y1="3" x2="12" y2="15"></line>
                </svg>
                <p class="upload-text">Drag and drop an image here</p>
                <p class="upload-subtext">or</p>
                <div class="button-group">
                    <button class="browse-button" id="browseButton">Browse Files</button>
                    <button class="camera-button" id="cameraButton">
                        <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
                            <path d="M23 19a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H3a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V8a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h4l2-3h6l2 3h4a2 2 0 0 1 2 2z"></path>
                            <circle cx="12" cy="13" r="4"></circle>
                        </svg>
                        Take Photo
                    </button>
                </div>
                <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept="image/*" hidden>
            </div>

            <!-- Preview Section -->
            <div class="preview-section" id="previewSection" style="display: none;">
                <div class="preview-header">
                    <h3>Uploaded Image</h3>
                    <button class="clear-button" id="clearButton">Clear</button>
                </div>
                <img id="previewImage" alt="Preview">
                <button class="search-button" id="searchButton">Search Similar Images</button>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- Results Section -->
        <section class="results-section" id="resultsSection" style="display: none;">
            <div class="results-header">
                <div>
                    <h2>Your Photos</h2>
                    <p class="results-count" id="resultsCount">Found 0 matches</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="results-grid" id="resultsGrid">
                <!-- Results will be populated by JavaScript -->
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <footer>
    </footer>

    <!-- Camera Modal -->
    <div id="cameraModal" class="camera-modal" style="display: none;">
        <div class="camera-modal-content">
            <div class="camera-modal-header">
                <h3>Take a Photo</h3>
                <button class="camera-close-button" id="closeCameraButton">&times;</button>
            </div>
            <div class="camera-container">
                <video id="cameraVideo" autoplay playsinline></video>
                <canvas id="cameraCanvas" style="display: none;"></canvas>
            </div>
            <div class="camera-controls">
                <button class="camera-capture-button" id="captureButton">
                    <svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="white" stroke="white" stroke-width="2">
                        <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle>
                    </svg>
                    Capture
                </button>
                <button class="camera-cancel-button" id="cancelCameraButton">Cancel</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
```
